div.p: Hello, thanks for taking the time to look at our second Quarterly Report.
In this quarter, we've really focused on our internal growth and focused on growing out the transformation
programme of 25 exemplar projects. A lot of that has been done quietly and in departments,
and out of the gaze of the public eye. We've had some notable public wins: the launch of
the Lasting Power of Attorney beta most recently, and prior to that, moving the rest of the
Whitehall departments onto GOV.UK, a platform that continues to improve and provide great
user benefit. On reflection, the spending round took more time than anyone could have
guessed before we started it, but we're through that now and looking forward to really pushing
on with our transformation of public services. You can now see, from today, where we stand
with this because we're doing this in the round. Have a look at gov.uk/transformation
for details of our 25 exemplars, and thanks again for taking the time to follow our digital progress.
